title: Living Off Rock (4U27)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a [Dunland] Man wins a skirmish involving a [Rohan] Man, you may make that minion strength +2 and fierce until the regroup phase.
Lore:	”'The Horsemen took your land; they drove your people into the hills to scratch living off rock.'”
Rarity:	U
